mapper.select: SELECT b.title, b.postdate, b.bgcolor, b.bgimage, b.content, u.id AS userId, u.username, u.icon FROM bulletin AS b LEFT JOIN user AS u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{id};
SELECT p.place_name, p.address_name, p.road_address_name, p.id FROM place AS p LEFT JOIN bulletin_place AS bp ON p.id = bp.place_id WHERE bp.bulletin_id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT u.icon, u.username, c.content, c.commentdate FROM comment AS c LEFT JOIN user AS u ON u.id = c.user_id WHERE c.bulletin_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (user_id, bulletin_id, content, commentdate) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{bulletin_id}, #{content}, #{commentdate})
